channel.title: 2018 - Auxy Forum Members
channel.description:
You can Introduce yourself and list your social media details using the template below.
This thread will focus on posting the details below only. Any general chatty posts, comments or questions will be trashed.
This replaces the earlier thread, which was a bit outdated.
---
![download|259x194](upload://rlElDaBmFUCLOQrK131cvpQfrf3.png)
> **Name (or producer name):** > **Other / Historical Names:** None. > **Country of residence:** xxxxxxxxx > **Age (optional):** > **Gender (optional):** > **Currently available for collaboration requests?** YES / NO. > **Currently available for remix requests?** YES / NO. > **Currently accepting requests for Auxy project files?** YES / NO. > **Preferred Genre(s):** >**Fav artists (non-Auxy):** >**Fav artists (Auxy):** >**First Album / CD / Track owned:** >
> - **Soundcloud:** > - **Instagram:** > - **Twitter:** > - **Discord:** > - **Youtube:** > - **Snapchat:** > - **Spotify:** > - **Website(s):** > - **Facebook:** > - **[Other]:**
**Links to best tracks:** > 1. > 2. > 3.
**Production Tools:**
> 1. Auxy > 2. > 3. > 4. > 5.
**Level of musical theory:** Low / Med / High **Instruments played in real life?** None. **Musical experience level:** Beginner / Casual / Serious / Professional **Musical goals:**

Preferred Genre(s): I like EDM, Hip-Hop, Rap, House.

Fav artists (Auxy): @aUstin_Haga @Peregrihn @Matik @Aviomusic @stereofield @TAURUS @Phluze @Produk @V-M

    Musical goals: Never stop learning as much as possible about sound physics; Eventually put out two more albums on Spotify.
